name: Redfoot Bluefoot Dancing for VIVE Trackers
name_original: Redfoot Bluefoot Dancing for VIVE Trackers
description:
Dance with your feet in VR! Inspired by Dance Dance Revolution and Audioshield.
Sophisticated algorithms that match the beat to the dance pad laser cannons.
First VR game built from the ground up for the feet and full body.
First dancing game that is able to distinguish each foot, endless combos.

Dance The Night Away With HTC Vive Trackers On Your Feet - VR Focus
The brilliant ways people are using HTC's Vive Tracker - Wareable

Best played with TrackStrap™, the universal strap for the HTC VIVE™ Trackers.
Learn more about Rebuff Reality and buy TrackStrap™ at https://rebuffreality.com/


Trailer Music: Alan Walker - Fade
Find on: Creative Commons Music Soundcloud
